title: Eine Reise in alle Himmelsrichtungen
translation: Today, Paula's family is taking a trip in all directions. They want to travel to the north, south, east, and west. At the train station, they read the announcement about the departure. Attention! The train to the east is leaving. Paula is still alone; her brother has to pick her up. The connection to the south is delayed. The parents tick the correct directions on the map. Then they register at the counter for registration. Another traveler offers Paula a map. After a long journey, they arrive at the station in the west. The arrival is mentioned in the announcement. Paula writes a card and puts the sender's name on it. The trip was exciting and they saw many directions.
